name: Blast To The Past (SwaritChoudhari)
description:
NOTE: THE GAME MAY LAG ON LOADING OF OTHER SCENES! FOR BEST PERFORMANCE, DO NOT HAVE ANY ENERGY-CONSUMING APPLICATIONS RUNNING IN THE BACKGROUND! I RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THE WINDOWS VERSION FOR BETTER PERFORMANCE!

------

In this game, you play as a scientist who apparently tried to create a time machine, but... that did not necessarily work. You got blasted back into time in space and are stuck. You can only get back to the real world by crafting your portal again! To do that, you must fight, gather, trade, and buy from shops to get what you need to make a portal. 25 steel + ions. Good Luck!

------

Controls:

  • W - move up
  • A - move left
  • S - move down
  • D - move right
  • Left Click - shoot

------

Source Code - https://github.com/SwiftyProgrammer690/github-gameoff-2022

------

This game was made for the 2022 Game Off Game Jam!
